snippet: The start of the trial for Dzhokhar Tsarnaev is much earlier than the date requested by the defense team.
abstract: Federal judge sets Nov 3 as the start of the trial for Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, who is accused of the deadly bombing of the Boston Marathon in 2013.
lead_paragraph: The start of the trial for Dzhokhar Tsarnaev is much earlier than the date requested by the defense team.

headline.main: Judge Sets Nov. 3 as Start of Trial for Boston Bombing Suspect
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Nov. 3 Trial Is Set for Defendant in Marathon Killings
